process: Wash rice;Fry onions;Add ginger garlic paste;Add chicken and spices;Add curd and tomatoes;Add rice and water;Cook on low flame;Serve hot

Boil water;Add eggs;Cook for 8 minutes;Cool and peel;Serve
Boil water;Add noodles;Add masala;Cook 2 minutes;Serve hot
Heat oil;Saute vegetables;Add rice;Add sauces;Mix well;Serve hot
Cook chicken;Heat oil;Saute vegetables;Add rice and chicken;Add sauces;Serve hot
Mix flour and water;Knead dough;Roll chapati;Cook on tawa;Serve hot
Wash rice;Boil water;Add rice;Cook until soft;Drain water
Boil dal;Heat oil;Add onion and tomato;Add spices;Mix dal;Serve hot
Cook dal;Cook vegetables;Add tamarind and spices;Mix dal;Boil and serve
Heat idli cooker;Pour batter in moulds;Steam for 10 minutes;Serve hot
Heat pan;Pour batter;Spread thin;Cook till crispy;Serve hot
Heat oil;Fry onion and chilli;Add water;Add rava;Cook stirring;Serve hot

Boil water;Add tea powder;Add milk and sugar;Boil;Strain and serve
